title: A SEAL to Protect the President
description: Becki Williams and Matt Benson, an ex-Navy SEAL, are working on an assignment together at the Protection Intelligence Bureau. While Matt has always been interested in a relationship with Becki, she has never reciprocated that interest. When Becki accidentally overhears a shocking plot, she turns to Matt to help foil a very deadly plot, shocked that someone she has always trusted is planning it.
author: Amy Coleman
